---
title: "Installing `malaria.em`"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

The `malaria.em` R package is now part of the [plasmogenepi.r-universe](https://plasmogenepi.r-universe.dev/builds).

You can install it by running the following code:
```{r install, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, error=FALSE, eval=F}
# Install malaria.em in R:
install.packages('malaria.em', repos = c('https://plasmogenepi.r-universe.dev', 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))
```
